alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Horry; Dillon; Marion; Northern Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 9:04AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A line of strong showers and isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of western Pender, Bladen, southeastern Robeson, Brunswick, Columbus, southeastern Dillon, Horry and eastern Marion Counties through 1000 AM EST... At 902 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong showers and isolated thunderstorms along a line extending from near Duart to near Fair Bluff to near Brittons Neck. Movement was east at 40 to 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Conway, North Myrtle Beach, Oak Island, Whiteville, Shallotte, Elizabethtown, Sunset Beach, Holden Beach, Ocean Isle Beach, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Cherry Grove Inlet, Myrtle Beach Airport, Little River, Socastee, Red Hill, Springmaid Pier, Horry, Iredell and Rowan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building until this line of storms passes through.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Horry; Dillon; Marion; Northern Horry
